text: Jean-Baptiste Boyer-Fonfrède (5th December 1760 – 31 October 1793) was a French Girondin politician. He was the 17th President of the National Convention from 2 to 16 May 1793. A deputy to the National Convention from his native city, Bordeaux Category:1760 births Category:1793 deaths Category:Politicians from Bordeaux Category:Presidents of the National Convention
title: Jean-Baptiste Boyer-Fonfrède
